group_analysis.note: A₄ is the tetrahedral rotation group

explanations: Color charge breaks A₄ for quarks
Seesaw mechanism preserves A₄ for neutrinos

breaking_mechanism.mechanism: Color confinement localizes quarks, breaking A₄; leptons preserve A₄

resolution.resolution: A₄ breaking is dynamical, not geometric
resolution.prediction: Same geometry, different flavor structures based on gauge charges

conclusion.explanation: A₄ breaking is dynamical (color confinement), not an inconsistency
conclusion.quarks: Color charge localizes at vertices → A₄ broken → small mixing
conclusion.leptons: Color neutral, seesaw protected → A₄ preserved → large mixing
conclusion.recommendation: Add explicit statement in theorem about dynamical A₄ breaking
